author: Justine Calma
title: Tigers (and other cats) can catch the coronavirus
description: Although it’s rare, animals can contract COVID-19 after being in close contact with a person infected with the novel coronavirus. There are precautions that zookeepers and pet owners can take to reduce the risk of transmission.
content:
What cat-adoring people should know
Malayan tiger cub in its enclosure at the Bronx Zoo. Its unclear whether this is one of the tigers that was exposed to the novel coronavirus. 
Photo by Andrew Lichtenstein / Corbis via Getty Images
